author: Special Correspondent
text:
A gold jewellery worker from Coimbatore has alleged that somebody had stolen a bag containing two kg gold jewellery while he was travelling from Thanjavur to Kumbakonam on Tuesday.

Vignesh (40) of R.S. Puram in Coimbatore and a worker with a gold jeweller there in a complaint with the police alleged that he was carrying 2 kg gold jewellery to traders in Kumbakonam after arriving in Thanjavur from Coimbatore.

After keeping the bag containing the gold jewellery, Vignesh claimed that he dozed off only to wake up when the bus was nearing Pasupathy Koil.

Vignesh was shocked to find it missing.

The complainant claimed that the jewellery was worth Rs. 45 lakh.
title: 2 kg of gold jewellery missing
